option.name: PARAMETERS
option.value: --master_port 163249 --nproc_per_node=4 tools/relation_train_net.py --config-file "/root/PySGG-cxg/configs/author_predcls.yaml" USE_CLUSTER False DEBUG False MODEL.TRAIN_FIRST_STAGE_ONLY False MODEL.TWO_STAGE_ON True MODEL.TWO_STAGE_HEAD.LOSS_TYPE 'cos_loss' SOLVER.IMS_PER_BATCH 32 TEST.IMS_PER_BATCH 4 DATALOADER.NUM_WORKERS 0 EXPERIMENT_NAME "2st_dist_cos_unionobjfution_matrix" MODEL.PRETRAINED_DETECTOR_CKPT "checkpoints/predcls-BGNNPredictor/2st_dist_cos_unionobjfution_matrix/model_0006000.pth" SOLVER.VAL_PERIOD 400 SOLVER.CHECKPOINT_PERIOD 400 MODEL.ROI_RELATION_HEAD.USE_GT_BOX True MODEL.ROI_RELATION_HEAD.USE_GT_OBJECT_LABEL True MODEL.ROI_RELATION_HEAD.DATA_RESAMPLING_PARAM.REPEAT_FACTOR 0.13 MODEL.ROI_RELATION_HEAD.DATA_RESAMPLING_PARAM.INSTANCE_DROP_RATE 1.6 MODEL.ROI_RELATION_HEAD.VISUAL_LANGUAGE_MERGER_EDGE True MODEL.ROI_RELATION_HEAD.VISUAL_LANGUAGE_MERGER_OBJ True SOLVER.BASE_LR 0.006
